sentences.sContent: I need to work in pleasant surroundings.
sentences.sCn: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

sentences.sContent: ...That people often experience trouble sleeping in a different bed in unfamiliar surroundings is a phenomenon known as the first-night effect...
...there is evidence to indicate that natural surroundings improve all kinds of things...
...Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%...

trans.tranOther: the objects, buildings, natural things etc that are around a person or thing at a particular time
